summary: A political satire about a group of skeptical American and British operatives attempting to prevent a war between two countries.
cast: Peter Capaldi|Harry Hadden-Paton|Samantha Harrington|Gina McKee|Tom Hollander|Olivia Poulet|Chris Addison|James Smith|Zach Woods|Mimi Kennedy|Anna Chlumsky|Enzo Cilenti|Lucinda Raikes|James Doherty|David Rasche|Reid Sasser|James Gandolfini|Johnny Pemberton|Chipo Chung|Del Pentecost|Joanna Scanlan|Joanna Brookes|Steve Coogan|Rita May|Paul Higgins|Alex Macqueen|Eve Matheson|Will Smith|Christian Contreras|Chizzy Akudolu|Stephanie Cannon|Jen Carden|Scot Cregan|Jim Hild|Julie Mun|Natasha Sattler|Janelle Schmidt|Tina Simmons|John Snowden|Al Sotto|Patrick Michael Strange|John Warman|Don Whatley
title: In the loop
